supporting_spans: The quartermaster made his preparations for departure, aided by the two sailors, one of whom attended to his horse, and the other to his provisions. Meantime Glenarvan wrote the letter designed for Tom Austin.
Ayrton suddenly sprang to his feet. In his hand was a revolver. A report was heard; and Glenarvan fell, struck by a bullet.
contradicting_spans: Ayrton suddenly sprang to his feet. In his hand was a revolver. A report was heard; and Glenarvan fell, struck by a bullet.
reasoning: Contradiction (factual): This passage directly contradicts the claim that Tom Ayrton/Ben Joyce unwittingly helped a black-marketeer dodge duty and was introduced to Duncan's smuggling ring.

analysis.claim_text: In Lisbon he unwittingly helped a black-marketeer dodge duty, was introduced to Duncan’s smuggling ring and, using his sea-craft, slipped past patrols several times; guilt nibbled at him yet profit lured him deeper.

sub_claims.text: In Lisbon he unwittingly helped a black-marketeer dodge duty.
He was introduced to Duncan’s smuggling ring.
Using his sea-craft, he slipped past patrols several times.

analysis.reasoning: Contradiction (factual): This passage directly contradicts the claim that Tom Ayrton/Ben Joyce unwittingly helped a black-marketeer dodge duty and was introduced to Duncan's smuggling ring.
